AI - Dropships and Reinforcements.text: Enable AI ships to land and deliver reinforcements on non-structured ground

Coffee Shop Vendor.text: Adding the ‘Vendor’ behavior to the Coffee shop in Area 18.

Derelict Reclaimer Space Missions.text: New missions added to Stanton in space surrounding derelict Reclaimers.

Siege of Orison.text: Implementation of a new dynamic event in the persistent universe.

Selling Items To Shops.text: Adding the "Sell" screen to item kiosks and converting them to Building Blocks Tech

Ship to Ship Refueling.text: Implementing refueling capability to specifically equipped ships

Mining Gadgets.text: Implementing new gadgets that can be placed on a ship-mineable rock that makes the rock easier to mine.

Anvil C8R Pisces.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the Anvil C8R Pisces ambulance.

Drake Cutter.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the Drake Cutter starter ship.

Greycat STV.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the Greycat STV ground vehicle.

Drake Corsair.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the Corsair multi-crew explorer.

Anvil Centurion.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the Centurion anti-air ground vehicle.

Drake Mule.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the Drake Mule cargo vehicle.

RSI Scorpius.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the Scorpius heavy fighter.

MISC Hull A.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the MISC Hull A cargo hauler

Rivers - Core Tech.text: Developing River Tech to be deployed within the persistent universe.

Daymar Crash Site.text: Derelict settlement of StarRunner & 600i crashsites on Daymar

New Rivers in Stanton.text: Introducing additional rivers in the Stanton system

Sand Cave Archetype.text: Building and distributing sand caves in Stanton.

Greycat PTV Race Track.text: Implementing a new PTV race track in the city of Orison.

Cargo System Refactor.text: Refactor of the ship cargo system to support found and purchased cargo

Sandbox Prison Activities.text: New suite of missions and sandbox activities to give inmates more opportunities to earn merits.

Security Post Kareah Reactivation.text: Crusader Security have moved back into Kareah and are bringing the station back online

New Missions - Orison.text: Bounty, Assassinate, Clear All and other missions to take place on the platforms created for Siege of Orison

Time Trial Race Missions.text: Players will be able to test their maneuvering skills on various race tracks around Stanton.

Salvage - Hull Stripping.text: Hull stripping and repair of ships

Drake Vulture.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the Drake Vulture salvage ship.

RSI Scorpius Antares.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the RSI Scorpius Antares

Greycat Multi-tool Salvage Attachment.text: Creation and implementation of the new multi-tool salvage attachment

Persistent Entity Streaming.text: Core technology to allow all items to fully persist in the game universe

Gen12 Scene Renderer.text: New Rendering Architecture to improve performance.

Lorville Cityscape.text: A rework of the Lorville landing zone's skyline.

New Player Experience.text: An initiative for improving the initial (first 30 minutes) gameplay experience

New Missions - Salvage Contracts.text: Addition of contracts players can buy into in order to find derelict ships to salvage.

New Missions - Ghost Hollow PVP Mission.text: Adding a new player vs. player mission type to Ghost Hollow on microTech.

Tractor Beam - Attach and Detach.text: Enabling hand held tractor beams to attach and detach items

RSI Lynx.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the RSI Lynx Rover.

Mirai Fury.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the Mirai Fury.

Mirai Fury MX.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the Mirai Fury MX

Seraphim Station.text: A new LEO station orbiting Crusader above Orison

Arena Commander: Frontend Update.text: Star Marine and Electronic Access merge into "Arena Commander" in this remade Frontend utilizing Building Blocks.

Arena Commander: New Racetracks.text: Adding four racetracks from the persistent universe alongside a new addition to New Horizon Speedway

Arena Commander: New Horizon Speedway Re.text: Placing New Horizon Speedway above its atmospheric home, the planet Green in the Ellis system.

Arena Commander: New Dogfighting Map - J.text: The INS Jericho debuts as the first persistent universe location to be added to the dogfighting map lineup

Arena Commander: New Elimination Map - E.text: FPS map Echo11 now playable in Elimination

Arena Commander: New Dogfighting Map - W.text: Hosted around the locations of the New Horizon Speedway racetracks comes the first in-atmosphere dogfighting map

Arena Commander: New Map - Security Post.text: Stanton’s most popular Security Post plays host to all FPS & Dogfighting Modes.

New Missions - Salvage Contracts: Coveru.text: Strip the hulls of criminal ships to hide evidence of their presence

Physicalized Cargo Updates.text: New cargo functionality including both Hull C support and large SCU containers.

Wheeled Vehicle Handling Improvements.text: Improvements to wheeled ground vehicle movement and handling.

MISC Hull C.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the MISC Hull C cargo vessel.

Mirai Fury LX.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the Mirai Fury LX

Anvil F8C Lightning.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the F8C heavy fighter.

New Crusader Platforms.text: New points of interest in Crusader's atmosphere.

New Missions - Retrieve Consignment.text: Locating and retrieving a consignment of goods for a organization or individual

New Missions - Steal Evidence.text: Steal files from Crusader Security at Security Post Kareah

Ship Trespass.text: Interior of player ships are now trespass zones for those without permission to enter, with permissions granted via the party system

New Missions - Data Heist.text: Implementing the stealing / uploading of data from various locations to an offsite handler.

Crusader A1 Spirit.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the Crusader A1 Spirit light bomber.

Crusader C1 Spirit.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the Crusader C1 Spirit cargo ship.

Tumbril Storm.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the Tumbril Storm light tank.

Argo SRV.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the Argo SRV.

Drake Cutter Scout.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the Drake Cutter Scout.

Replication Layer Update.text: Separating the Replication Layer from the game server to prepare for a server-meshed environment.

Player Hair Update.text: New hairstyles for player characters in Star Citizen

New Derelict Settlements.text: New derelict settlement locations in Stanton

Salvage - Structural.text: Transform large chunks of metal from salvaged ships into refinable material

Inventory - Cargo Containers.text: Allow players to store smaller items in larger cargo containers

Arena Commander: New Map - Bloodshot Rid.text: A new Arena Commander FPS and Flight map set in a derelict settlement.

Arena Commander: New Map - Maker's Point.text: A new FPS map in Arena Commander set in a settlement on Hurston.

Arena Commander: Multicrew & Spawn Locat.text: Spawn selector updates to allow for multicrew and location selection.

Aopoa San'tok.y\u0101i.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the Aopoa San'tok.yāi medium fighter.

Origin X1.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the Origin X1 hover bike.

Origin X1 Velocity.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the Origin X1 Velocity racing bike.

Origin X1 Force.text: All tasks required for the implementation of the Origin X1 Force pathfinder bike.
